name: syriana-student-app
description: Syriana Student App - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run build && cd backend && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production cd backend && npm start

author: Hesham Al Dandan
